hero.title: AOT app
hero.description: Explore the world of <1>Attack on Titan</1> like never before. Browse characters, quotes and test yourself in the quiz.

about.title: The perfect companion for watching
about.description1: We created this app to make it easier for you to follow the storyline. You will find key information presented in a clear way.
about.description2: Speed and convenience are our strengths. Thanks to advanced filters and comparison tool, you will instantly find the characters you are interested in, without unnecessary noise.

features.title: Everything in one place
features.description: Discover features prepared especially for fans of the series. Designed to deepen your experience.

database.title: Character Database
database.description: Browse profiles of hundreds of characters and get to know their stats.

quotations.title: Quotations
quotations.description: Get inspired by the words of your favorite characters. Discover iconic lines from the anime.

quiz.title: Knowledge Quiz
quiz.description: Check how well you know the world of Attack on Titan by taking the quiz.

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.description: Create your own collection of favorite characters and have quick access to them.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to your questions about the project.

free.question: Is the app free to use?
free.answer: Yes, AOT APP is a fan project created out of passion. Using all features is completely free and requires no fees.

spoilers.question: Are there spoilers in the app?
spoilers.answer: We try to mark content that may be spoilers for people who have not finished the series.

mobile.question: Does the app work on mobile devices?
mobile.answer: Yes, the app was designed as a PWA (Progressive Web App). It works great on phones and tablets, and you can even install it on your home screen.

source.question: Where does the information in the database come from?
source.answer: Data is collected based on official data books, manga and Attack on Titan (Shingeki no Kyojin) anime.

footer.description: Comprehensive knowledge base and tools for Attack on Titan fans.
